data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Setúbal, Portugal.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Setúbal, Portugal

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Setúbal, Portugal to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Setúbal, Portugal. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Spirit, teach the 27,748 believers in the state of Setúbal the wisdom of how to form simple, reproducible churches of 12-30 in every neighborhood.

Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Turk people.
Lord, let it be said of the 760,752 lost in Setúbal that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the state of Setúbal prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of Setúbal, Portugal has a population of 788,500.

We estimate Setúbal has 27,748 people who might know Jesus, 703,890 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 56,862 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 28 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the state of Setúbal to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

location.name: Setúbal
location.people_groups_list: Dutch, Arab, Lebanese, Chinese, general, Japanese, Jew, Portuguese-speaking
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Dutch (3,300), Arab, Lebanese (20,000), Chinese, general (11,000), Japanese (700), Jew, Portuguese-speaking (600)
